title: VIP

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Attributes:
- This can be rolled in any town slot.
- If this would roll, the game becomes VIP mode with this player as the VIP. All whispers are disabled, all Townies are notified who the VIP is, and it is publicly announced that there is a VIP. Whoever rolled as VIP then immediately rerolls into the same Town slot they would've rolled into. If the VIP dies, all Townies immediately commit suicide.
